for an increased demand in their services. In 
Uganda, the proportion of deliveries that took 
place at any health facility increased by 62%, 
from 46% before Phase 1 (baseline) to 74% after 
Phase 1 (endline). In Zambia, it increased by 
35%, from 63% at baseline to 84% at endline.
Increase in EmONC Facility Births: The
